subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the 2002-3 season, 13 N.H.L. players had roots in Ornskoldsvik’s local team, Modo, and now a new generation is ready to make its impact on the wider hockey world.
snippet: In the 2002-3 season, 13 N.H.L. players had roots in Ornskoldsvik’s local team, Modo, and now a new generation is ready to make its impact on the wider hockey world.
